Header.title: Pimpri Serological Institute Blood Center
Header.paragraph: Donate blood and be the reason for someoneâ€™s existence.

About.paragraph: Our blood bank is committed to protecting the safety of both donors and potential recipients by providing quality blood and blood products from non-remunerated, healthy donors following a stringent screening process. Voluntary blood donation, being the safest form of blood donation, is encouraged. The blood bank provides for the blood requirements of patients within the hospital as well as various other hospitals and nursing homes in the city. The blood bank is licensed to prepare Whole Blood, Packed Red blood Cells, Platelet concentrate, Fresh Frozen plasma, Cryoprecipitate, Single donor platelets (platelets prepared by pheresis), Plasma pheresis and leucodepleted blood.

Testimonials.text: "Hindustan Petroleum is proud to be associated with PSIBC blood bank for this CSR activities. The blood donation camp was well co ordinated efforts and quite a successful initiative."
Testimonials.name: (HP) Jagan Dongre

Testimonials.text: "It was really a happy day for all Genpact employees.Thank You for the opportunity with collection of 150 packets of blood.There were overwhelming reactions observed!"
Testimonials.name: (Genpact) Mohini Ali

Testimonials.text: "I am a regular donor and have donated in numerous camps. But donating with PISBC Blood bank, has always been a pleasent experience. You guys are saving lives, I feel proud and empowered every time I donate."
Testimonials.name: (Donor) Makranda Desai

Contact.address: Esteem Tower, 4th Floor,Kharlwadi,near Surya Hotel, Old Mumbai - Pune Hwy, opposite Ksb Pump, Pimpri Colony, Pimpri-Chinchwad, Maharashtra 411018

Features.title: Institutional Review Board
Features.text: Responsive and innovative solutions to meet unique requirements for research, commercial, and educational use.

Features.title: (HPC) Products
Features.text: (HPC) products and transplant support. Order response turnaround that is sensitive to time-critical needs.

Features.title: Clinical trial programs
Features.text: Clinical trial programs in partnership with educational and research organizations, biotechnology and medical device companies.
